author: Janis Rozenfelds
description:
User Profile plugin for Adobe XD enables designers to displays beautiful generated avatars in your design prototype.

Designed for designers and optimized to be simple and fast.

Reach out to janis.rozenfelds@gmail.com with any question or just say hello.

name: User Profile
